This game is absolutely hilarious, and I definitaly recommend anyone out there to give it a shot. I mean, come on, it's free!

!!!!!!!!///////////////SPOILERS SO WATCH OUT///////////////////!!!!!!!

Pros:

1. The game is absolutely hilarious, funny gags, nice little endings, and interesting interaction.

2. The music, not bad, it's definitely something remarkable. 

3. Despite being a simple game, it does make me stop and wonder, what if we only had 60 seconds? the game ends on a similar resolution, and is something that does make a point.


Cons:

 - There's not much to say, but the game is rather short and sometimes repetative, but it doesn't matter, doesn't ruin the big picture


I like to put this game in my stress releaser 101, so anyone out there just to have fun, go give it a shot!

7/10

40772619.review:
[h1]Meteor 60 Seconds![/h1]

This is the first title from Avocavo and I must say I am genuinely pleased from having to play it.
It's a very fun and short simulation game. It's a good point and clicker game if you want to waste some extra time. Play it between your study time, even from your work or when you're bored from other games.
I wouldn't mind a longer version of this, with multiple more endings and some cutscenes. 
✾
You can kiss dogs, women or men. Fist fight with the human beings. Shoot people with an AK-47 or deploy a nuclear reciever. Save the earth or destroy it as you like. Equip a bat and smash your way trough this cute retro game. 
✾
Do anything you want to do with your last 60 seconds before the meteor puts the earth to death. Game is fairly well written and the 2D artwork is nothing out of the ordinary. There's 9 different endings. It features 3 Languages. Korean, Japanese and English. It have sound settings, resolution and graphic quality for you to change if needed. 
✾
Meteor 60 seconds! is a simple, fun, comic-like action game that's well worth passing your time. 8/10

40636687.review:
Meteor 60 Seconds è un videogioco Free to Play, 2D a scorrimento dove bisogna decidere cosa fare (o non fare) nei 60 secondi prima che un meteorite distrugga la terra. 

1. Grafica, GUI e suoni
La grafica è 2D a scorrimento, con modelli di personaggi minimalistici. E' presente solo un livello.
La gui è composta da tasti semplici, non ci sono mappe o altro. In gioco è possibile usare sia la tastiera che il mouse, oppure solo tastiera. 
I suoni sono anch'essi molto semplici: alcuni effetti sonori e una musichetta nel menu e durante la partita.
Non ho critiche da fare su questa categoria. Lo stile "minimale" si adatta bene, anche perchè in 60 secondi non si ha molto tempo per guardare i dettagli.
Forse la traduzione inglese non è delle migliori ma si capisce abbastanza. Non è presente la lingua italiana.


2. Gameplay e storia
Il Gameplay è molto semplice. Si hanno 60 secondi di tempo prima che un meteorite distrugga la terra. Possiamo eseguire diverse azioni, come ad esempio baciare le persone oppure picchiarle fino ad ucciderle, che condizioneranno il giudizio post partita. Infatti [spoiler]alla fine dei 60 secondi il protagonista si sveglierà in uno "studio medico" e scoprirà che ciò che ha vissuto faceva solo parte di un test di personalità. A guardare la partita, però, c'era parte della sua famiglia: la madre, la ragazza e suo cugino di 5 anni. Ognuno esprimerà un proprio giudizio quindi attenzione a come vi comportate![/spoiler] Sono presenti vari finali, ognuno dipendente dalle proprie azioni. 
Ho impiegato circa 30 minuti per completare tutti i finali.
Non è un videogioco molto lungo (anzi!) e neanche difficile.
Mi ha divertito abbastanza.

In conclusione, se avete una mezz'oretta da perdere (o comunque non sapete cosa fare), vi consiglio di provare questo videogioco, essendo anche Free to Play e molto leggero.

40586257.review:
(1) Every ending starts with the same dialogues, but instead of skipping through them to the actual ending, you have the choice between watching the whole thing and skipping the whole thing. Annoying, because you'll want to unlock all 9 endings and the game only lasts 60 seconds. You'll spend more times in menus and dialogues instead of actually playing the game - just because of the lack of a single button.

(2) You play the entire game with the keyboard, but for planting the nuke receiver you suddenly need to use the mouse - I almost had to search for a guide to find out how to do it because there's no hint on that. You also can't open the pause menu with ESC or something, you have to click a button with your mouse. Really, how hard can it be to implement consistent controls?
UPDATE: You'll now get a hint that you place the receiver with the mouse.

(3) Upon launching the game, it shows you the famous control mapping options most Unity games have. However, remapping any of the controls doesn't do anything because the controls are fixed in the code. Removing buttons from the options and replacing the fixed controls by mapped controls in the code literally takes less than 5 minutes, wtf. This would also fix (2).

For a free game it's pretty good. Despite being such a small game, it lacks a bit of polishing. More possible interactions and endings would be nice, but it's ok as it is.

如同影片介紹，簡單講就是地球要在([strike] 再拉幹	[/strike])60秒後被隕石撞擊毀滅了，
而在這時候，你會做甚麼呢?

故事就此展開，你可以到處打人/破壞東西，或是親吻[strike] 調戲	[/strike]街上的人群...

詳細我這邊就不雷啦~

+好笑/輕鬆/幽默，遊戲有許多逗趣的結局與反應。

[strike] 還好這只有打/親，沒有更多...	[/strike]

沒有支援中文，但是英文不是很困難，基本上都是日常生活單字。

[b] 警告	[/b]

This is a decent game to play, even though the game isn't long, there's lots of ending to choose from which some of them are enjoyable, and entertaining. I wish for more small enjoyable games like this on Steam.

[h1][b][u]Pros:[/u][/b][/h1]
[list]
    [*] The game free to play, and better than a lot of those crappy indie games shove on to Steam.
    [*] Decent amount of things to do for the next 60 seconds.
    [*] There's reasons to reply the game, with multiple endings.
    [*] You have choices, and the order you do it in will reflect at the end of the whole game.
[/list]

[h1][b][u]Cons:[/u][/b][/h1]
[list]
    [*] Wish there was more things to do.
    [*] Game isn't really long. 
[/list]

Would I recommend someone to play this? Depends on the person, but I recommend it to people who like stupid comedy, or put in another way that doesn't have stupid high standards.

40446023.review:
This game is a shitty wannabe Stanley Parable that thinks it's exploring the inner-psychosphere, the crux of the paradox of the self-serving nature of human nature, what doth life, but in fact the only thing it's exploring is the far-reaches of the outer rim of my patience. My year 9 scratch (or is that snatch ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;) project was more fun than this. OK i'm lying, that really was a shit game (you can still find No Man's Sky at most major retailers though).

However, with all that in mind, this game is amazing. Apart from the irritating stock controls - 'G' is hit, 'H is kiss?! Surely 'H' should stand for hit and 'G' should stand for 'groom'. Also, the 'kissing' mechanic is utterly bewildering, with it indicating to you that it'd be a friendly action but then causing all the women-folk that I immediately besmooched to be ravaged with hatred - at one point there was a literal clusterfuck of about 8 women kicking the shit out of me - I was begging for the meteor to hit me by then! Not a problem i've ever had in real life, that's all i'm gonna say - my backhand is way too strong haha. Also, it was literally impossible to kiss the streaking man, a missed opportunity in my opinion.

9/15 - generous as it's a 30 second download and it provides 15 minutes of fun - by that maths a game that takes 3 hours to download should provide a lifetime of fun, but it really isn't a very compelling game.

Простенькая игрушка, которая затянет вас буквально на 10-15 минут в лучшем случае. Больше там делать нечего. 

Сюжет: мы узнаем, что через 60 секунд на Землю упадёт метеорит и мы все погибнем. Наш герой выбегает на улице и уже по нашему выбору делает определённые действия. В игре есть 9 различных концовок

Геймплей: как я уже сказал ранее, он на 10-15 минут. Мы можем бегать вправо-влево, целовать людей (и собак тоже, почему бы и нет) или убивать их. Должен отметить неудобное управление, оно пока кривое и немного багованное.

Игра бесплатная и явно недоделанна. Можно и лучше

40439922.review:
Esta muy bien este juego, es uno muy rapido, lo e bajado en un minuto, pesa unos 170 mb. Tiene 9 finales, mas un "plus" especial para el jugador que lo esta jugando. Este final "plus" te dice como as jugado TU mismo al juego (no el personaje), se desbloquea al terminar todos los otros 9 finales, luego esta una opcion llamada: "???". Mi consejo es, empezad a jugar al juego siendo vosotros mismos y no busqueis finales, no useis las pistas y jugad normal asta jugar al juego 4 o 5 veces.

Yo la primera vez me lo pase sin hacer nada por que lei en estos comentarios que habian diferentes finales. Si lo llego a saber me pongo a besar a todo el mundo jajajaja. Como e dicho, me lo pase sin hacer nada, no pulse ni un boton, solo deje que el tiempo pasara. No saque un final tipo "estoy quieto sin moverme", si no de pacifista creo o algo asi. Ojala sacaran un final como el que e dicho.

En total e gastado una media hora, mas o menos. Si no sabeis a que jugar, os lo bajais y en un momento os pasais el juego. Esta en ingles, pero es un ingles muy sencillo.

地球に巨大隕石が衝突するまでの６０秒間、何をするかというテーマのゲーム。

キスできるとはいってもJKにキスしたら周囲にいる男たちが一斉に襲いかかって来るし、
イチャついてるカップルの片方にチューすると、もう片方が襲ってくる。
